links.title: Stock Market Sells-Off Again As New Reasons To Sell Stocks Emerge
links.description: The stock market fell again today, honestly, it doesn't matter because the reason shifts on daily basis. Rising rates, inflation, trade wars, technology stock valuations, Amazon, politics, more trade wars, now its Apple and yields again! Ugh. Exhausting to say the least.

links.title: Stocks Fall Despite Mostly Great Earnings
links.description: The good news is the earnings season's results have been great so far after about 15% of firms have reported. The bad news is this hasn't pushed stocks up much.
